**Data Sources**  
I gather match data from a variety of public sources. Please check out these excellent websites:

- [Club Elo Ratings](https://clubelo.com)
- [ESPN](https://www.espn.com/soccer/)

- [FotMob](https://fotmob.com)
- [Transfermarkt](https://transfermarkt.com)
- [Understat](https://understat.com)
- [WhoScored](https://whoscored.com)
- [World Football Elo Ratings](http://eloratings.net/)
